extendedIngredients.name: bitters
extendedIngredients.originalString: Dash of aromatic cocktail bitters, such as Angostura

extendedIngredients.name: dark rum
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 ounces (1/4 cup) dark rum, such as Mount Gay or Myers's
metaInformation: such as mount gay or myers's

extendedIngredients.name: ginger juice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 teaspoons fresh ginger juice (from 1 1/2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger pressed through a paper towel or cheesecloth)
metaInformation: (from 1 1/2 tablespoons ginger through a paper towel or cheesecloth)

recipes.title: The Hugo Cocktail from 'The Lee Bros. Charleston Kitchen
recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Add the rum, ginger juice, 1 of the lime wedges, the sugar, and bitters, if using. Shake vigorously.                                                                                                                            2                                                                            Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes. Pour the cocktail over the ice, top off with seltzer, and garnish with the remaining lime wedge and a rod of ginger, if using.

steps.step: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add the rum, ginger juice, 1 of the lime wedges, the sugar, and bitters, if using. Shake vigorously.
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cocktail over the ice, top off with seltzer, and garnish with the remaining lime wedge and a rod of ginger, if using.
